item.title: I am The Post’s ‘federal government whisperer.’ It’s been brutal.
item.description: One reporter’s effort to show how Trump was transforming government brought her 1,168 new sources — and nearly broke her.

item.title: Despite anti-media rhetoric, the government is still reading the news
item.description: The Trump administration is spending tens of thousands of dollars on paywalled news sites, including Politico and Bloomberg, despite earlier criticism...

item.title: Congress set records in 2025, some more dubious than others
item.description: Republican lawmakers reflect on a year without much productivity and greater ceding of powers to the White House.

item.title: Supreme Court blocks National Guard deployment to Chicago in defeat for Trump
item.description: The Supreme Court held that the president’s authority to deploy the National Guard for law enforcement purposes likely only applies in “exceptional” c...

item.title: Republican former senator Ben Sasse says he has terminal cancer
